name: Lookup
description: Perform secure password hash lookups using the Range API without submitting sensitive data to the server.

name: Passgen
description: Generate a wordlist based on user-provided keywords for targeted password testing.

name: Passcheck
description: Discover if your password is in the weakpass_4 wordlist or vulnerable to advanced rule-based attacks.

name: IP Subnet Calculator
description: Calculates subnet masks for standard and non-standard IP ranges, calculates CIDR prefixes from subnet masks, calculates subnet masks from CIDR prefixes.

name: Get Public IP
description: This is a simple Cloudflare Worker that returns your client public IP address. No extra stuff like tracking or ads, just your IP address.

name: BloodHound Neo4j wrapper
description: This tool help you manage multiple databases from bloodhound / neo4j.

name: Get Cities
description: This Cloudflare Worker fetches city data from the Countries Now and allows API filtering by country, city name prefix, and the number of cities returned.
